values: Kia ora. Tūroa is closed for the 2022 season. We look forward to welcoming you all back for winter 2023.
Kia ora. Tūroa is closed for the 2022 season. We look forward to welcoming you all back for winter 2023.

Kia ora. After a number of hopeful assessments, a decision has been made to close Tūroa for the 2022 season. Whilst we have received 5 - 15cm of fresh snow, the damage is just too extensive, and rebuilding is not a possibility. It has been one hell of a season for the crew. They have sought out the impossible, and made the best of what they were given. We know that some epic riding was had, albeit over fewer days than we had hoped. There is still some great spring skiing and riding to be had at Whakapapa, and we look forward to welcoming you all back for winter 2023.

Whilst we have received 5 - 15cm of fresh snow, the damage is just too extensive, and rebuilding is not a possibility. It has been one hell of a season for the crew. They have sought out the impossible, and made the best of what they were given. We know that some epic riding was had, albeit over fewer days than we had hoped. There is still some great spring skiing and riding to be had at Whakapapa, and we look forward to welcoming you all back for winter 2023.

Kia ora. After a number of hopeful assessments, a decision has been made to close Tūroa for the 2022 season. The damage is just too extensive, and rebuilding is not a possibility. It has been one hell of a season for the crew. They have sought out the impossible, and made the best of what they were given. We know that some epic riding was had, albeit over fewer days than we had hoped. There is still some great spring skiing and riding to be had at Whakapapa, and we look forward to welcoming you all back for winter 2023.

Kia ora. After a number of hopeful assessments, a decision has been made today, to close Tūroa for the 2022 season. The damage is just too extensive, and rebuilding is not a possibility. It has been one hell of a season for the crew. They have sought out the impossible, and made the best of what they were given. We know that some epic riding was had, albeit over fewer days than we had hoped. There is still some great spring skiing and riding to be had at Whakapapa, and we look forward to welcoming you all back for winter 2023.

Kia ora. During this last storm cycle, we have seen warm and wet conditions across all elevations. With the weather beginning to clear today, our operational teams will be able to get out into the field and make further assessments of the snow pack. Due to this, Tūroa will remain closed today. Please also check the Whakapapa report page, as we are in a better position on that side to offer your school holiday Spring snow experience. Thank you for your understanding, and we hope to see you back up here again soon.

Kia ora. During this last storm cycle, we have seen warm and wet conditions across all elevations. As such, our already fragile snow-pack and trails have been reduced in volume and will continue to do so until we see a change in temperature. Due to the need to rebuild these trails with heavy machinery, which at this stage will do more damage than good, all facilities at Tūroa will remain CLOSED today. We need to see these conditions change to cooler temps and for the snow-pack to dry out and stabilise before a full assessment and restorative works can begin. For these reasons, we see it unlikely that we will have a chance to operate over the next few days; however, we will continually keep you updated here as we work things out. Please also check the Whakapapa report page, as we are in a better position on that side to offer your school holiday Spring snow experience. Thank you for your understanding, and we hope to see you back up here again soon.

Kia ora. During this last storm cycle, we have seen warm and wet conditions across all elevations. As such, our already fragile snow-pack and trails have been reduced in volume and will continue to do so until we see a change in temperature. Due to the need to rebuild these trails with heavy machinery, which at this stage will do more damage than good, all facilities at Tūroa will remain CLOSED today. We need to see these conditions change to cooler temps and for the snow-pack to dry out and stabilise before a full assessment and restorative works can begin. For these reasons, we see it unlikely that we will have a chance to operate over the next few days; however, we will continually keep you updated here as we work things out. Please also check the Whakapapa report page, as we are in a better position on that side to offer your school holiday Spring snow experience. Thank you for your understanding, and we hope to see you back up here again soon.
Kia ora. Due to gale-force wind and rain, all facilities at Tūroa will be CLOSED today.
Mōrena. All facilities at Tūroa will be CLOSED today.
Mōrena. Due to the weather, Tūroa will be closed today.
Kia ora. We have another beautiful warm spring day up on Tūroa, with high cloud and a slight breeze from the North. The High Noon Express is now OPEN with the Movenpick for access. Kia pai to rā.

Mōrena, the wind has dropped overnight leaving us a beautiful bluebird Spring day. The High Noon express is scheduled to OPEN at 10am with the Movenpick for access. Come and join us for some awesome spring conditions. Make sure to wear your sunscreen. Kia pai to rā.

Mōrena. We're above the cloud here at Tūroa this morning, with stronger winds than forecast. These winds are below our threshold, and The High Noon Express with access on the Movenpick is scheduled to OPEN from 10am for some sunny spring laps!

Mōrena. It's a clear but windy morning here at Tūroa, and the winds are forecast to decrease throughout the day. The High Noon Express is now OPEN with the Movenpick for access. Conditions on-trail are machine packed, variable off-trail. Kia pai tō rā.

Kia ora. The High Noon Express is now OPEN with the Movenpick for access. We are expecting a calm day with passing cloud which may affect visibility especially in the afternoon. Conditions on trail are machine packed, with off-trail beginning firm but we expect to see this release as the morning goes on.
Kia ora. Due to gale force wind and rain, all facilities at Tūroa are closed today.

Ata Mārie. A clear morning at Tūroa with a cool breeze. The High Noon Express with access on the Movenpick is now OPEN for advanced skiing and riding. Conditions are machine packed on trail, and icy off trail. The Alpine Meadow beginner area will be closed, after significant rain damage after the last few days. Kia pai tō rā.
Kia ora, due to heavy rain, extensive rebuilding of trails will need to be completed, therefore Tūroa is closed today. Check the report this afternoon for an update on tomorrow. Kia pai to rā.
Kia ora, due to high winds all facilities at Tūroa are closed today. Please check the report this afternoon for our plan for tomorrow. Kia pai to rā.
Mōrena, Tūroa is closed for the day. This is due to gale force winds which are above our operational threshold and forecast to continue throughout the day.

Ata Mārie. Another sunny spring morning at Tūroa. We are expecting an epic day on the maunga today with little to no wind and mostly clear skies. The High Noon Express, with access via the Movenpick, and the Alpine Meadow are now OPEN . Conditions are machine-packed on trail variable off trail conditions set to soften into great spring riding from this afternoon. To support our operations with limited staff, all passes and rentals MUST be purchased online today. Breast Cancer Foundation NZ is fundraising this week and there will be donation stations at all points of sales to raise funds, Kia pai tō rā.

Ata Mārie. A sunny spring morning at Tūroa. We are expecting an epic day on the maunga today with a gentle breeze from the NW and the odd passing cloud throughout the day. The High Noon Express, with access via the Movenpick, and the Alpine Meadow are now OPEN. Conditions are machine-packed on trail, and powdery pockets off trail. To support our operations with limited staff, all passes MUST be purchased online today. Breast Cancer Foundation NZ is fundraising this week and there will be donation stations inside the cafe's along with a BBQ outside the Alpine Cafe to raise funds, Kia pai tō rā.

Ata Mārie. A clear morning at Tūroa, with around 5cm of fresh snow at the top of the High Noon Express. The High Noon Express with access on the Movenpick, as well as the Alpine Meadow are now OPEN. Conditions are machine-packed on trail, and powdery pockets off trail. To support our operations with limited staff, all passes MUST be purchased online today. Kia pai tō rā.

Mōrena. It's a beautiful morning here at Tūroa. Avalanche control work has been completed via helicopter, and we have begun trail building on the upper slopes, and de-icing the High Noon Express. The de-icing work required is extensive, and we have not been able to access the upper towers due to avalanche risk. The High Noon Express, with access on the Movenpick will be significantly delayed. Until our team have completed de-icing, we will be unable to provide an ETA. The Alpine Meadow Sunkid and Poma are now OPEN. Kia pai to rā.

Mōrena koutou katoa. Kua marama te rangi. We have received 5-10cm of snow overnight and the weather is forecast to clear throughout the day. At the moment we have very little wind and low cloud over the ski area. We are still waiting for blue skies so we can undertake avalanche heli bombing on the upper mountain. The High Noon Express and Movenpick are CLOSED for the day. The Alpine Meadow beginners area is now OPEN. Kia pai to rā.
Kia ora. Due to the high winds and avalanche safety requirements, all facilities at Tūroa are closed today. Check back in this afternoon for an update on our plan for Wednesday. Kia pai to rā.

Kia ora. Due to the high winds and avalanche safety requirements, all facilities at Tūroa will be CLOSED for Monday and Tuesday. An update on our plan will be posted here on Tuesday afternoon. Pō Mārie.

Kia ora, due to blizzard conditions over the last 24 hours and forecast gale force wind from the NE increasing through this morning we require extensive avalanche control work, including using a helicopter to be completed. Due to these conditions and requirements to open, the High Noon Express will be CLOSED today. The Alpine Meadow Carpet Lift is now OPEN. The Ohakune Mountain Road is OPEN and unrestricted.

Kia ora. Overnight we have had fresh snowfall and cold temps. The Movenpick is now OPEN for access to the High Noon Express which is OPEN for skiing and riding. The Alpine Meadow Carpet Lift is also OPEN. Today's forecast has strong gusty NE winds which are expected to increase throughout the day and more snow is expected to low levels. A NE wind as is forecast does indicate that lift operations may be affected later in the day, with the Movenpick being the only access back to base we will be closely monitoring the wind speed throughout the day. With snow expected to low levels we ask that all vehicles carry chains with them.

Mōrena. It's a beautiful clear and crisp morning at Tūroa, with 2-3 cms of fresh snow overnight, today is shaping up to be epic! The High Noon Express, with access on the Movenpick is OPEN. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet is also OPEN. Conditions on trail are machine-packed, and variable off trail. Please remember to purchase passes BEFORE arriving at the base area, to avoid delays. Kia pai tō rā.

Mōrena. It's a fine and clear morning at Tūroa, and we've had a fresh dusting of snow overnight. The High Noon Express with access on the Movenpick, and the Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet are now OPEN. Conditions on trail are machine-packed, and variable off trail. Kia pai tō rā.

Kia ora. This morning we have a moderate westerly wind, and some cloud. There was freezing mist and wind overnight, which means there is de-icing to be completed. This is currently underway, and we are on track to OPEN the High Noon Express, with the Movenpick chair for access however, there will be a delay. The Alpine Meadow Sunkid is now OPEN. Kia pai tō rā.

Mōrena. Winter is back and we have received 30+cms of snow overnight. Due to High winds and avalanche risk all facilities at Tūroa are CLOSED today. The wind is forecast to drop throughout the day, which means we can complete avalanche control work and de-icing. Check back in this afternoon on how we are looking for tomorrow. Kia pai to rā.

Kia ora. This morning we have a light to moderate cool breeze with passing cloud and snow flurries. The High Noon Express is now OPEN with the Movenpick chair for access. We are expecting to see a change in the forecast this afternoon with winds increasing and snow fall to low levels, which may affect operations and the Ohakune Mountain Road.
Kia ora. All facilities at Tūroa are CLOSED today, due to gale force winds. Another assessment will be made for Monday at 4.00pm this afternoon.
Kia ora. Due to gale force winds and rain, all facilities at Tūroa will be CLOSED for the day. A new report will be made this afternoon at 4.00pm for Sunday.

Mōrena. The High Noon Express is above the cloud this morning. The High Noon Express is now OPEN, with access on the Movenpick. The High Flyer Park is also OPEN. Please remember the trails are open for intermediate - advanced skiing and riding only. Kia pai tō rā.

Mōrena. A beautiful day at Tūroa, with the High Noon Express is now OPEN, with access on the Movenpick. The High Flyer Park will also be OPEN. Please remember the trails are open for intermediate - advanced skiing and riding only. Kia pai tō rā.

Mōrena . It is a beautiful bluebird day up here on Tūroa, a perfect day to reopen the High Noon. The snowmakers and groomers have worked their magic over the last couple of weeks. The Tūroa park crew has even managed to get a couple of features ready in the High Flyer park. The High Noon Express is now OPEN with the Movenpick for access. Please keep in mind the trails we are offering, are for intermediate to advanced skiers and riders only. We are all looking forward to seeing you up here. Kia pai to rā.

Kia ora. Tūroa will remain CLOSED whilst we continue with snowmaking and trail building efforts off of the High Noon Express. We have seen temperatures drop over the last couple of days, which has allowed us to operate snow guns, and our grooming team are working around the clock to move snow and rebuild trails.

Kia ora. Tūroa will remain CLOSED for the remainder of this week. The snow-pack and trails will need extensive rebuilding, and after a lot of assessments we will need at least 20-30cm of adequate snow on the upper mountain to be able to consider opening the High Noon Express, with a significant snowfall required to consider any other facilities. If you have any lessons or programmes booked for this week, our team will be in touch with you shortly.

Kia ora. Tūroa will remain CLOSED for the remainder of this week. The snow-pack and trails will need extensive rebuilding, and after a lot of assessments we will need at least 20-30cm of adequate snow on the upper mountain to be able to consider opening the High Noon Express, with a significant snowfall required to consider any other facilities. If you have any lessons or programmes booked for this week, our team will be in touch with you shortly.

If you have any lessons or programmes booked for this week, our team will be in touch with you shortly.

The snow-pack and trails will need extensive rebuilding, and after a lot of assessments we will need at least 20-30cm of adequate snow on the upper mountain to be able to consider opening the High Noon Express, with a significant snowfall required to consider any other facilities. If you have any lessons or programmes booked for this week, our team will be in touch with you shortly.

The snow-pack and trails will need extensive rebuilding, and after a lot of assessments we will need at least 20-30cm of adequate snow on the upper mountain to be able to consider opening the High Noon Express, with a significant snowfall required to consider any other facilities. If you have any lessons or programmes booked for this week, our team will be in touch with you shortly.

Kia ora. Tūroa will remain CLOSED for the remainder of this week. The snow-pack and trails will need extensive rebuilding, and after a lot of assessments we will need at least 20-30cm of adequate snow on the upper mountain to be able to consider opening the High Noon Express, with a significant snowfall required to consider any other facilities. If you have any lessons or programmes booked for this week, our team will be in touch with you shortly.

Kia ora. Tūroa will remain CLOSED for the remainder of this week. The snow-pack and trails will need extensive rebuilding, and after a lot of assessments we will need at least 20-30cm of adequate snow on the upper mountain to be able to consider opening the High Noon Express, with a significant snowfall required to consider any other facilities. If you have any lessons or programmes booked for this week, our team will be in touch with you shortly.

Kia ora. Tūroa will remain CLOSED today. We have continued to see strong winds and rain on the field. The snow-pack and trails will need a lot of rebuilding, and a full assessment on works required to repair trails are underway however, due to the significant damage to the snowpack, this will need additional time. Any updates will be communicated here.

Kia ora. Tūroa will remain CLOSED today. We have continued to see this warm, atmospheric river drive gale force winds and rain onto the field. The snow-pack and trails have clearly taken damage, a full assessment on works required to repair trails are underway however, due to the fragility in the snowpack this will need additional time. Tūroa Ski and Ride Development and Team Ruapehu Programme Athletes meeting at Ruapehu College on Saturday. Please bring lunch, water and comfortable clothing for conditioning training with Coaches Session will run from 9.30am to 1.30pm. See you there!

Kia ora. Tūroa is CLOSED today due to gale force wind and rain. Tūroa Ski and Ride Development and Team Ruapehu Programme Athletes meeting at Ruapehu College on Saturday . Please bring lunch, water and comfortable clothing for conditioning training with Coaches Session will run from 9.30am to 1.30pm. See you there!
Kia ora, due to gale force winds and heavy rain, all facilities at Tūroa will be CLOSED today.
Mōrena. Due to the adverse weather which is forecast to continue throughout the day, all facilities at Tūroa are CLOSED. If you have a lesson booked, our team will be in touch.
Kia ora, due to high winds and rain all facilities at Tūroa are CLOSED today.

Mōrena, We have passing cloud and a north westly wind today at Tūroa. The Alpine Meadow Platter, Alpine Meadow Carpet, Giant and The High Noon Express are now OPEN with the Movenpick for access. Grooming on trail is firm and off trail is variable. The forecast today has increasing winds which may affect operations. Please pre purchase online to avoid the queues. See you soon!

Mōrena. A fine and clear day above the clouds at Tūroa today, with a light wind from the NE. The Alpine Meadow, Movenpick (access only), Giant, and High Noon Express are now OPEN. Conditions are machine-packed on trail, and variable off-trail.

Mōrena. It's a beautiful day here at Tūroa today, and we've had another successful night of snowmaking. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet, Alpine Meadow Platter, Movenpick (access only), Giant, and the High Noon Express are scheduled to OPEN. Conditions on trail are machine-packed, and variable off trail. Please remember to purchase passes, rentals, and lessons online to avoid delays at the base area. Kia pai to rā.

Mōrena. Its a stunning bluebird day at Tūroa today. Snowmaking has been pumping all night long and our grooming teams have managed to secure new trails Big Bowl and Boneyard. The Alpine Meadow Carpet and Alpine Meadow Platter is now OPEN. The High Noon Express is scheduled to OPEN from 9.00am with the Movenpick for access. We also have a surprise for you today and will be OPENING the Giant chair for the first time this season! There is no current ETA on the Giant opening however we expect this to be operational by early morning. A couple of small terrain park features have been installed in the Alpine Meadow along with a sledding lane that will be available for use from 11am, please book online.

Mōrena. It's a beautiful bluebird winters day here at Tūroa today, and we've had another successful night of snowmaking. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet, Alpine Meadow Platter, Movenpick (access only) and the High Noon Express are scheduled to OPEN from 9am. We can now offer intermediate skiing and snowboarding off the High Noon Express. Conditions on trail are machine-packed, and icy off trail. Make sure you wrap up warm as it's definitely winter here today, with wind chill sitting at around -10 on the upper mountain. Please remember to purchase passes, rentals, and lessons online to avoid delays at the base area. Kia pai to rā.

Kia ora. It's a clear winters day here at Tūroa today, with winds beginning to increase. We've had a successful night of snowmaking; The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet, Alpine Meadow Platter, Movenpick (access only) and the High Noon Express are now OPEN. Upper mountain trails are for advanced skiers/snowboarders only. Conditions on trail are machine-packed, and icy off trail. Make sure you wrap up warm as it's definitely winter here today, with wind chill sitting at around -22 on the upper mountain. Please remember to purchase passes, rentals, and lessons online to avoid delays at the base area. Kia pai to rā.

Mōrena, Bluebird day at Tūroa today. The Alpine Meadow Carpet is now OPEN. The Movenpick and High Noon Express are currently ON HOLD while maintenance complete their daily checks. Avalanche control has been completed. We now have Little Bowl open with access from the High Traverse. Packed grooming on trail and variable off trail with pockets of snow. Caution patches of ice on and off trails. Trails from the top of the High Noon Express are Expert level only. Please pre purchase online to avoid the queue. See you soon!

Mōrena. The Alpine Meadow is now OPEN, the Movenpick and High Noon Express are CLOSED due to high winds. Winds are forecasted to increase throughout the day, which has effected operations. Tomorrow is looking like a fine day, hope to see you here. Kia pai to rā.

Mōrena, clear skies and a light South Easterly breeze at Tūroa this morning. The Alpine Meadow Carpet is now OPEN. The High Noon Express is now OPEN for advanced skiing and boarding , with access on the Movenpick. The High Flyer Park is also OPEN. Conditions are machine-packed on trail, and icy off-trail.

Kia ora. Weather conditions are set to improve throughout this morning and we expect to have passing cloud and a moderate NW wind today. The Alpine Meadow Carpet is OPEN, the Alpine Meadow Platter CLOSED due to low snow. We currently have a refreezing mist which is actively icing the High Noon Express, preventing us from loading chairs onto the line. We will continue to monitor this and expect the situation to get better shortly. The High Noon Express is scheduled to OPEN from 10:30am for expert skiing and snowboarding ONLY, once de-icing work is completed. Next update to this report will be at 10am. Pre purchase your passes online to avoid the queues, see you soon!

Kia ora. Clear skies and gusty warm Northerly winds today at Tūroa. The Alpine Meadow Platter and Alpine Meadow carpet is now OPEN. The High Noon Express is ON HOLD due to winds exceeding acceptable operating limits on the Movenpick which is needed for access. Wind gusts are still above the operating threshold however we may soon see this plateau and this will give us a good opportunity to assess our capability to operate. Next update will be at 10.00am. Grooming on trail is firm and off trail is variable with patches of ice, trails from the top of the High Noon Express are Expert level only. Please pre purchase online to avoid the queues. We still have a good amount of availability for first timer and beginner lessons, and we recommend booking as soon as possible. See you soon!
Kia ora. A calm and sunny winters day today at Tūroa, The Alpine Meadow Platter and Alpine Meadow Carpet is Now OPEN. The High Noon Express is now OPEN with the Movenpick for access ONLY.

Mōrena, fine and clear day at Tūroa today with a light breeze. Conditions are hard-packed on trail, and icy off-trail. Recent weather means there is de-icing work to complete prior to opening the High Noon this morning. We anticipate a delayed opening of the High Noon Express with access on the Movenpick for advanced skiing and riding only. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet and Alpine Meadow Platter are now OPEN. Please remember to purchase all passes, rentals, and lessons online ahead of arriving to avoid delays.

Mōrena, high winds have effected our operations for the upper mountain. Alpine Meadow carpet and Alpine Meadow platter are now OPEN. Wind is forecasted to decrease throughout the day, with fine weather expected tomorrow and Friday! Kia pai tō rā!

Mōrena, we have passing cloud with clear patches on the ski area with a slight breeze from the north west. The Alpine Meadow and High Noon Express are now OPEN for skiing and riding with access on the Movenpick. The wind is forecast to increase throughout the day. The groomers have worked their magic overnight and we now have the Vertigo trail open. Caution black ice on the Mountain road above Massey Flat and please be careful of underfoot conditions when exiting vehicles. Kia pai to rā.

Mōrena! The wind has settled and we have snow on the ground again. Due to a power outage on the upper field, the High Noon Express is ON HOLD whilst assessments are made. We'll update here when more information comes to light from the Lines Company. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet and Alpine Meadow Platter are now OPEN. Remember to purchase all lift passes, rentals, and lessons online before arriving to avoid delays.

Kia ora, Strong winds and blizzard conditions have been with us all night and are set to continue throughout today. All facilities at Tūroa will be CLOSED today. Operational teams will be working hard today to recover trails and facilities for when this storm backs off. The Ohakune Mountain Road is CLOSED and will likely remain that way throughout the day as we expect snow to low levels.

Kia ora, Due to strong wind gusts and blizzard conditions all facilities at Tūroa will be CLOSED today - We have had snowfall overnight and our grooming teams have resumed work on the upper trails. We are expecting to see more snowfall over the next 24 hours and all gears are in motion to restore trails and prepare lifts for when the weather backs off.
Mōrena, inclement weather has all facilities at Tūroa CLOSED today. The forecast is for the freezing level to continue to drop over the next couple of days, and snow is expected.
Mōrena, Gale force winds and heavy rain has all facilities at Tūroa CLOSED today. The forecast has a lowering freezing level and snow flurries forecast over the next few days.

Mōrena! Heavy rain over night, more forecasted throughout the day. Due to rain saturation of the snowpack and the need for extensive rebuilding of trails Tūroa will be CLOSED TODAY. We have snow in the forecast over the next few days, so keep your eyes on the report for the next update. Keep doing those snow dances! If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena. We have a wet and windy morning up here at Tūroa, with rain saturation across the ski area. Which means all facilities are CLOSED. Snow is forecast in the next few days, which we are looking forward to! If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena! Current conditions at the base area are cool and calm, with conditions expected to worsen as the day progresses. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet and The Alpine Meadow Platter are now OPEN. Gusts of over 100km on upper lift lines has the Movenpick and High Noon Express CLOSED. If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena! The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet and The Alpine Meadow Platter is now OPEN. The High Noon Express is now OPEN for advanced/expert skiing/riding, with ski on/ski off access on the Movenpick. Conditions are machine packed on trail, and variable off trail. Please take caution when walking around the plaza due to icy conditions. Due to team absence due to illness, all lift passes must be purchased online. If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena, The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet and The Alpine Meadow Platter is now OPEN. We have first timer and beginner lessons available, which can be booked online. We are doing our final checks today on the High Noon in preparation for opening tomorrow. Please take caution when walking around the plaza due to icy conditions. If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Kia ora, The snow has been falling all night and the skies have cleared for an epic day. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet and The Alpine Meadow Platter is now OPEN. We have first timer and beginner lessons available in the Alpine meadow, which can be booked online. Please take caution when walking around the plaza due to icy conditions. If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Kia ora, We currently have a north-westerly wind, and scattered showers which are forecast to get heavier throughout the day. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet is now OPEN. We have first timer and beginner lessons available in the Alpine meadow, which can be booked online. Snow is forecast in the next few days, which we are looking forward to! If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena. We have passing cloud here at Tūroa this morning, Light drizzle is forecasted throughout the day. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet is now OPEN. Alpine Meadow Platter is CLOSED for the day. We have first timer and beginner lessons available in the Alpine meadow, which can be booked online. Snow is forecast in the next few days, which we are looking forward to! If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena. A wet and windy morning here at Tūroa, the wind is forecast to ease as the day goes on. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet and the Alpine Meadow Platter are now OPEN for skiing/boarding. We have beginner and first timer lessons available in the Alpine meadow, which can be booked online. Snow is forecast in the next few days, which we are looking forward to! If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena. A clear morning with a northerly wind here at Tūroa, which is forecast to increase as the day goes on. There's been another great night of snowmaking, the Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet is now OPEN for skiing/boarding. There will also be additional features added to the Alpine Meadow park from today! We're looking forward to an epic winter, If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Well, what a great night of snowmaking we have had at Tūroa! We are happy to announce that the Alpine Meadow Carpet lift will be OPEN from 9am for beginner ski and ride. We have first time lessons available to purchase online! Today's forecast is for a calm, crisp and sunny day - So come on up, we cant wait to see you here. We're looking forward to an epic winter, If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Kia ora. Due to limited snow coverage across the mountain, all lift facilities will remain CLOSED at Tūroa today. The Alpine Cafe and Retail shop will be OPEN from 10am until 2pm, so please come on in for a hot coffee and a snack! Overnight, the conditions have finally allowed for Snowmaking across the field and we are looking forward to putting more white gold onto the trails over the coming days. The forecast for today has a calm and mostly clear day for you to enjoy the stunning sights of this mighty maunga. We're looking forward to an epic winter, If you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Kia ora. Unfortunately, due to limited snow coverage in the Alpine Meadow, Tūroa is closed today. The good news is we have seen some natural snowfall overnight, and with the current weather and temperatures, there should be an opportunity to fire up the snow guns over the coming days. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Kia ora. Unfortunately, until we see either some natural snowfall, or a window for snowmaking, facilities will be unable to open. As a result, Tūroa will be CLOSED tomorrow (Thursday 14th July). We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Kia ora. Unfortunately, due to the heavy rain that we have experienced at Tūroa, which is forecast to continue, the decision has been made to CLOSE tomorrow (Wednesday 13th July). The snow in the Alpine Meadow has been impacted and unfortunately, until we see some natural snowfall, or a good window to allow for snowmaking we will be unable to open. Additional assessments will be made tomorrow afternoon to see how the rest of the week is shaping. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Kia ora. Heavy rain, high winds, and rain impacted snow have all facilities at Tūroa CLOSED today. If you have a lesson booked, our team will be in touch after 8.00am to reschedule. The local industry and business meet and greet will still be going ahead in the Alpine Cafe between 10.30am and 11.30am. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena. We have light to moderate NE wind here at Tūroa this morning, the Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet is now OPEN! All other lift facilities will remain closed for the day due to limited snow. We have beginner group lessons and private lessons for both skiing and snowboarding, so come on up! Please remember to purchase all passes, rentals, and lessons online. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena. The weather here at Tūroa has drastically improved, we currently have scattered showers that will ease throughout the day. This means today is the first day for skiing and boarding at Tūroa this winter season. The Alpine Meadow Magic Carpet is now OPEN, all other lift facilities will remain closed for the day due to limited snow. Please remember to purchase all passes, rentals, and lessons online. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Mōrena. Unfortunately, the weather and snow conditions at Tūroa means that all skiing/snowboarding facilities and terrain are CLOSED. The Alpine Cafe and Vertical retail will be open between 10.00am and 2.00pm. If you had a lesson booked, our team will reach out to you after 8.00am. Please check back tomorrow for an update on facilities and conditions. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

Unfortunately, all facilities at Tūroa are CLOSED today due to very high winds, and wind affected snow in the Alpine Meadow. The weather forecast for tomorrow is looking much better, and we'll update you here by 7.00am tomorrow. If you had a lesson booked, our team will reach out to you after 8.00am. Please note the locals meet and greet is postponed to a later date due to poor conditions. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa

The countdown is on for winter 2022 and our snow dances are paying off. As of the 15th June, we're reporting 75cm at the Giant and counting! Whilst the report page will not be updated each day until we open for the season, you can check out our website, Facebook and Instagram to keep up with how things are shaping. We're looking forward to an epic winter, if you think you have what it takes to join the crew, we're hiring! Apply now at https://www.mtruapehu.com/jobs #weareTūroa
